channel.title: Vicious Revolution - The Official Release
channel.description:
[Center][IMG]http://i850.photobucket.com/albums/ab62/luka2005/top100arena2_zpsfe27cd24.gif[/img][/center]
[Center][IMG]http://i850.photobucket.com/albums/ab62/luka2005/viciousthreadfordarkbg_zpse2c56284.png[/img][/center]
So basically, our lovely ex-developer Eric, decided to go behind our backs and sell a copy of the server. That copy of the server eventually got to the buyer's head thinking he had every right to the server and decided to give it to friends and try to sell it too. Eventually it started to circulate even more and was released three times on moparscape by loved, xx K03D xx on R-S tried to sell it and then decided to release it, and a user that goes by the name Westernngg released it on RuneLocus too. So here I am, sadly, releasing a server that has over $1 grand and the accumulated time of 5 developers over a year.
This release includes:
[ol][li]Server[/li] [li]Client (Webclient compatible Fullscreen and Resizeable)[/li] [li]Fileserver (Update-server or Loginserver)[/li] [li]Cache[/li][/ol]
[b]The server is a PI server off Virtue which you can find: [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,652803.0.html]HURR[/url].[/b]
Here is some older media:
[CENTER][font=arial black][b][u][size=18pt]Media:[/size][/u][/b][/font]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bdWFzWio_DI
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Df_sWbpF4k
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UQSE7MD1HRE
Its winter time in Vicious Revolution! Snow during December and January. Uses the Gregorian Calender to determine the day. Christmas Event is being written as well. [center][IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/yay.png[/img][/center]
Our amazing clan chat thanks to Galkon. [center][IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/clan.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://localhostr.com/files/zLY0sRk/vicious-revolution-website2.png[/img] [img]http://localhostr.com/files/br9857V/vicious-revolution-website.png[/img] [img]http://localhostr.com/files/qsmWYhn/vicious-revolution-website3.png[/img]
Leeched Scott's videos just for the pure fact that we're now using Virtue as a base and we might as well use these videos as show offs since it would be a waist of time to re-record them. Credits to Scott* for the following videos. :)
[U]WARNING - In earlier videos, not all features were added. Also if you see the wrong color of GFX, that has been fixed.[/U]
~~ Familiar Special Attacks 1 - 10:

~~ Familiar Special Attacks 71 - 78:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdL-mIhb40c&feature=plcp

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ctnK_usEZg
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XExlxWKq7cY
[URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/show-off/420300-summoning-full-skill.html"]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/show-off/420300-summoning-full-skill.html[/URL]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dee5tObd7_w
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VaMucTY9KFc

Credits to:
Me Luka for the money and time he invested AtomicInt_ (Ryley) L__A (Will) Sigex Juan Anthony Shaq asshole_rule (Nick)

[Center][/center]

So basically, our lovely ex-developer Eric, decided to go behind our backs and sell a copy of the server. That copy of the server eventually got to the buyer’s head thinking he had every right to the server and decided to give it to friends and try to sell it too. Eventually it started to circulate even more and was released three times on moparscape by loved, xx K03D xx on R-S tried to sell it and then decided to release it, and a user that goes by the name Westernngg released it on RuneLocus too. So here I am, sadly, releasing a server that has over $1 grand and the accumulated time of 5 developers over a year.

This release includes:

[ol][li]Server[/li]
